item.description:
https://www.facebook.com/events/513133302059783/

 

 

Atlantis Cloudveil Snowflake Regatta is a fun day on the ski slopes
with all your summer sailing and power boating
friends. So gather your crew to race a “Giant Slalom
NASTAR Type” course – and remember – it’s okay
to snowplow!
...
PHRF, One design, cruising and power boat classes
are welcome! Crews can organize without the captain.
Individuals can organize without a team! This is a
day to enjoy with your Summer Friends!!

Race in the morning and free ski in afternoon. The
awards party will follow in the main lodge with
appetizers and more.

Great Deal! Ticket discount TBD for
racers pre-registered by March 1st 2013!

Email: snowflakeregatta@gmail.com with your
boat name, name and age of all team members that
you think might be coming. If you don’t have all the
info, we’ll fill it in when you get there.

The Rules
(Team rules are relaxed for One-Design and Power
Boat Divisions) There is no limit to the number of
racers per boat: the more the merrier, so no experience
necessary! All Team (boat) trophies will be based on the
combined corrected times of the 3 fastest racers.
*Note it maybe beneficial to have a co-ed team but it is not required.
PHRF Championship: Team members must have raced
with you in the past season to be eligible for the boat
trophies! (Ringers may be challenged)

Schedule
Friday night -March 8th Casual Crew and Skippers Gathering
as you arrive at :

Tuckerman's Restaurant & Tavern
http://www.tuckermanstavern.com/index.php/directions

Saturday - March 9th
• 8:00 – 9:30: Registration & Race Ticket Purchase
in our reserved room on main floor - “Sorry CASH Only” Race
Tickets - Include: NASTAR Race and day of skiing

• 10 – 12:00: Race on the “NASTAR TYPE” Giant
Slalom course. Each Crew member will have 2
race runs.

• 3:30: Après Awards Party in our reserved room
– nonracers
welcome to join in the fun.

Après Awards
***Tickets will be available to Racers and Non Racers.****
Email snowflakeregatta@gmail.com for details.

Housing
Plan early to get a ski house for the whole team.
Look in Jackson, Bartlett, Intervale or North Conway, NH
www.mtwashingtonvalley.org •
www.skiwildcat.com/lodgingpackages •
www.cyberrentals.com
item.name: Annual Snowflake Regatta Cloudveil 2013 @ Attitash Mountain NH
